page.title: 01The area in general.
page.content: Our area is basically centred around the Lox Yeo River Valley, which is situated in the extreme south of the County of Avon. It is almost exactly divided in half by the M5 motorway. The area is mostly farm land. There are only a few villages which are {Christon, Barton} and the outskirts of Hutton. There is one church at Christon. Our area also includes a part of {Banwell,}which includes Banwell bone caves, and Banwell monument. Most of the villages in the area are very small. Christon has a population of 36, most of who work either on the farms, work in Bristol or nearby towns.
